product_name: Mountain Summit Gear Low Boy Beach Camp Chair - Special Buy
long_description: This cozy camp chair rides low to the ground, keeping your butt elevated and your head out of the way for added campsite comfort and crowd-pleasing convenience at outdoor movies or concerts.
